title: Notes State Management
description: Learn state management techniques for note applications including searching, filtering, and sorting operations

functions.name: searchNotes
functions.description: Search notes by title or content using a query string

parameters.name: notes
parameters.description: Array of note objects with title and content properties

returns.description: Filtered array of notes matching the query

functions.name: sortNotesByDate
functions.description: Sort notes chronologically by creation date

parameters.name: notes
parameters.description: Array of note objects with createdAt timestamp

parameters.name: ascending
parameters.description: If true, sort oldest first; if false, newest first

parameters.name: notes
parameters.description: Array of note objects with title property

parameters.name: ascending
parameters.description: If true, sort A-Z; if false, sort Z-A

functions.name: filterNotesByLength
functions.description: Filter notes by content length (min and max characters)

parameters.name: notes
parameters.description: Array of note objects with content property

returns.description: Filtered array of notes within the length range

functions.name: getNotesByTag
functions.description: Get notes that contain a specific tag in their tags array

parameters.name: notes
parameters.description: Array of note objects with tags property (array of strings)

returns.description: Notes that include the specified tag

functions.name: getNotesStatistics
functions.description: Calculate statistics about the notes collection

returns.description: Object with properties: totalNotes, totalCharacters, averageLength, shortestNote, longestNote, mostRecentDate, oldestDate

functions.name: getNotesGroupedByDate
functions.description: Group notes by their creation date (day)

parameters.name: notes
parameters.description: Array of note objects with createdAt timestamp

returns.description: Object with date strings as keys and arrays of notes as values

functions.name: getRecentNotes
functions.description: Get the N most recently created notes

parameters.name: notes
parameters.description: Array of note objects with createdAt timestamp

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of recent notes to retrieve

returns.description: Array of the N most recent notes in descending order

functions.name: filterByMultipleTags
functions.description: Filter notes that contain ALL specified tags (intersection)

parameters.name: notes
parameters.description: Array of note objects with tags property

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Array of tags that notes must contain

returns.description: Notes that have all specified tags

functions.name: createFilteredView
functions.description: Create a complex filtered view combining multiple filters

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: Filter object with optional properties: searchQuery, minLength, maxLength, tags, sortBy, sortOrder

returns.description: Filtered and sorted array of notes
